Package com.barrel

Class MessageQueue

java.lang.Object
com.barrel.MessageQueue
public class MessageQueue extends Object
Represents a concurrent message queue for storing JSON messages. A MessageQueue is responsible for storing messages in a queue and managing expected message IDs and missing messages.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MessageQueue(long maxId)
    Constructs a MessageQueue object with the given maximum message ID.

  • Constructor Details

    • MessageQueue

      public MessageQueue(long maxId)
      Constructs a MessageQueue object with the given maximum message ID. Initializes the message queue, missing message IDs, and expected message ID.
      Parameters:
      maxId - The maximum ID expected in the messages.

  • Method Details

    • push

      public void push(org.json.JSONObject message)
      Pushes a message into the message queue. If the message is a resend message, it is added to the queue. If the message ID is not the expected ID, it is added to the missing message IDs. If the message ID is the expected ID, it is added to the queue and the expected ID is incremented.
      Parameters:
      message - The JSON message to push into the queue.

    • pop

      public org.json.JSONObject pop()
      Pops a message from the message queue. If the queue is empty, the thread waits until a message is added to the queue.
      Returns:
      The JSON message popped from the queue.

    • getMissingIds

      public ConcurrentHashMap<Long,Long> getMissingIds()
      Retrieves the ConcurrentHashMap containing missing message IDs and their arrival times.
      Returns:
      The missing message IDs.

    • resetTime

      public void resetTime(long id)
      Resets the arrival for a specific message ID in the ConcurrentHashMap.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the missing message for which to reset the arrival time.
